website_summaries.verdict: Whether you have clematis, cucumbers, roses, or berries, you'd have a hard time finding a trellis for your favorite plants with more to offer than this impressive model.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These look great and are easy to install. The problem is that after just a few months in the sun/weather, they are already beginning to sag in the middle. Too bad the manufacturer didn't include a piece of steel or aluminum angle across the bottom bar, so that these things would continue to look nice for a few years. Although they looked perfect upon installation as seen in the first attached photo, they began sagging in the middle (where there is no post) less than 6 weeks after being installed, as seen in the second photo. The other two photos show the sagging at nine months after being installed (straight yellow lines added to photos for reference).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just want we were looking for we needed a sturdy trellis for a trumpet vine our last one broke in half in a ice storm this past winter. This is beautiful & sturdy. We installed and attached it to wooded posts instead of attaching directly to the garage itself. Very happy with this purchase it is even better looking in person and installed.
customer_reviews.author: H&M

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo badly made and unnecesarily complicated
customer_reviews.text: This thing is made of plastic and nothing holds the sides on except gravity - so if you put it together and try to stand it up - one side falls off every time - I know - it has taken me two days to put it together and get it on my fence . . . THEN the screws to hold it onto the fence are hex screws - who the hell has hex screw drill bits? So its tied on to the fence until my plant grows well enough to hold it up . . . literally buy any other trellis on Amazon except this one . . .
customer_reviews.author: animallover

customer_reviews.title: Great Trellis! dont hesitate.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing in my cart for months! I took the plunge and finally ordered it and boy im glad i did! this thing is really great! I hate putting things together, im not good at reading directions and i lose patience quickly. well it took me only about an hour to get thing up and ready for spring! directions are pretty much pictures which is great for me. not even alot of packaging to dispose of. its basically heavy plastic. all the pieces slide together, but make sure you put the pieces together as the directions say. there's an order to it. really happy i bought it and look forward to my growing wisteria! see my photo.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for awhile for a tall and sturdy trellis (around 8ft) and I wanted something relatively easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for awhile for a tall and sturdy trellis (around 8ft) and I wanted something relatively easy to put together. After reading all the positive reviews, I decided to purchase this trellis and I'm glad I did! It was so easy to assemble! You just need a power drill and some crazy glue (for the top decorative pieces). We used the spacers that were included to mount it to the fence. From start to finish...probably took less than an hour. I thought about getting the white, but I'm glad I got the mocha. It has a more subtle and more natural look. Definitely want to get more of these later.
customer_reviews.author: JJK

customer_reviews.title: Very responsive manufacturer!
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble getting the horizontal posts into the openings in the vertical supports. I asked people about it and no one had the same problem, but one person said to contact the company - that they were extremely responsive. I did and they were amazing. They sent out 2 new vertical posts with holes cut a bit larger. I received them in 3 days! I was able to complete the assembly with no further problems and then mount it to 4x4s so I could use it as a free standing visual divider in my garden. I have never been so impressed with a company.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Jones

customer_reviews.title: I still don't like how much it sways in the wind
customer_reviews.text: These have no hope of standing on their own without the included hardware for mounting to wooden posts, a house or some other structure. However, with clever use of zip-ties and traditional fence stakes you can make this work. I wish it was a bit stiffer, I still don't like how much it sways in the wind, but oh well. Looking forward to my ivy climbing up it.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: The trellis was easy to put together and very light to work with
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. I attached it to 4 x 4 post painted the same color, centered in front of two large windows about twenty feet apart. I added green trellis netting to each one. I planted two honeysuckle plants in front of each one. The netting is very helpful and does not take away from the beauty of the trellis. Each trellis will provide shade and privacy to each window. I have already gotten many compliments from evening walkers. The trellis was easy to put together and very light to work with. I highly recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Duane B. Wade

customer_reviews.title: This kit does not include glue so go to the store to purchase it before putting it together
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this product 5 stars but for the price I paid you think the kit would have included the glue???? So after putting it together (and it takes 4 hands) I could not finish the top because I had to stop my production and go to the store to purchase the clear pvc. A little of an inconvenience because I lost my help at that point, now I have to get it up by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Trellis
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after looking a a lot of trellis'. I had in installed by first installing two poles cemented into the ground then attaching the trellis to the poles. Worked beautifully. It allowed me to raise the trellis higher than it would be if I installed it directly into the ground. Also like the color as it does not detract from the climbing rose bush the it holds. Assembly, past the first couple of steps only required one person. Really happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Assembly is super easy
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Assembly is super easy. I ordered two of these. I used exterior clear silicon on the caps. I mounted these free standing, not against a wall. Placed the two side by side. Drove into the ground 3 metal fence posts. Then bolted 2x4 pressure treated to the posts and screwed the trellis to that. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Gerorge

customer_reviews.title: great look
customer_reviews.text: We bought two, one for privacy and the other to support a climbing rose. We mounted the one for the rose on 6 1/2 foot T-post or steel post. I spray painted the post a few shades lighter than the mocha color. It appears as though we weren't trying to hide the post and turned out be have a neat look to it. We put the post side to our fence and the rough side of the post to the trellis. Naturally we had to drill the steel post then bolted them together (without the spacers). The trellis appears to be floating. Though I prefer wood, these Winchesters' looks great and will certainly require far less maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Good appearance
customer_reviews.text: A bit tricky to assemble. Lots of parts. Easier to lay on flat surface such as garage floor when doing so. Once assembled I screwed ends in so they would not pull out when I handled. Also attached wood extensions on the back of the unit in order to bury for support because we did not attach the trestle to a support which is recommended. Looks great and wood extensions (ground contact rated wood) hold it up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gilson

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and holds jasmine vines great against the wall.
customer_reviews.text: I had a wall that was just too bland. So I put this up against it and planted jasmine at the base and now the walls looks great. The jasmine flowers beautifully and smells great in the spring. This thing is light and easy to assemble and well made. you could make your own with wood, but the wood eventually rots. This plastic will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis dad

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this low maintenance trellis. I purchased some climbing roses and put 2 of these up against a brick wall in the backyard. My husband was very insistent that he did not want to drill holes into the side of the house to secure it. Instead he cut small blocks the width of the outside rails and used liquid nail to secure. Worked great! Can't wait for roses to start climbing!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I recommend that you not mount it to a wall for ...
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was quick and simple. I recommend that you not mount it to a wall for until it has been exposed to the sun for a few days. I need to removed the center vertical post screws to allow the horizontal rails to level out. Once this was done all the rails were level. They look great mounted and included mounting hardware was more then adequate for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Heyman

customer_reviews.title: Vague instructions & mounting screw caps are tan not mocha
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trellis, HOWEVER, the instructions could be MUCH clearer and organized in a better step-by-step manner. The caps that cover the long mounting screws are TAN, not mocha and they don't match! Everything else is mocha except the screw caps. Winchester, you need to fix this!
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Good, inexpensive arbor
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Despite paying what I thought was close attention, some of the horizontal slats sagged. Also be very attentive to where the pre-drilled holes are placed. I messed up a few slats (got 'em backwards) but our plant's don't mind and you can't really see it.
customer_reviews.author: Dehypnotist

customer_reviews.title: Looks Natural and It is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks natural and easy to assemble. Very sturdy. Only drawback is that IF you wish it to stand on its own, the legs "should" be longer and pointier, or have a pointy option for easy placing in ground. The color blends in well and looks natural. While it IS plastic, the color makes it look more upscale.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Zam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Trellis!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for some much needed privacy from a looky lounge neighbor. I added some faux ivy and boxwood. We had to bolt it to the fence, it is not free standing. It goes over 2 feet above our 6 foot fence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and install, very sturdy. I got 3 of those, attached to a wooden fence and stucco wall. The original color works for me, though the plastic looks paintable. When attaching to thin fence, i found that the screws ate too long and would stick out on the neighbor side. I simply used a 3/4” PVC cut a bit longer than supplied pieces, painted to similar color.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry

customer_reviews.title: Not intended for mounting against stone, brick, or concrete walls
customer_reviews.text: This trellis is a great size, but it is very lightweight and must be anchored to a wall. Despite photos showing this trellis against stone walls, the provided fasteners do not attach it to stucco (which is where I need the trellis). Had this been specified in the description I would have purchased something else. I'm sure I can figure something out at the hardware store, but I had ordered this thinking it was a one-stop-shop solution and it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: I_buy_from_amazon

customer_reviews.title: Classy Addition to My Yard
customer_reviews.text: Classy look! And functional privacy screening (when my vines get bigger). It is relatively easy to assemble (be sure to read enclosed instructions well). I really like it and am glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Vivier

customer_reviews.title: Trellios does the job
customer_reviews.text: We used the trellis to grow a Jasmine plant. This is working out very good. The trellis is sturdy and was pretty easy to assmble and install. We purchased a second one for a similar application and it too is going the job.
customer_reviews.author: jeff olseth

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Oversized for shipping, PO won't deliver had to pick up. At first, an issue putting things together but once each side in place things were easy. Everything needed to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Elllis

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble. Looks ok
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to assemble. Slots are smaller or same size as posts ( in engineering terms; interface fit without sufficient clearances ). It took a lot of fiddling and time to assemble one unit and I bought 3 units :( looks ok once assembled. It’s PVC so I’m sure it will warp over time in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: N.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great trellis! Looks fabulous and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this trellis that I am thinking of purchasing 2 more. It was really easy to assemble (actually kind of fun) and it looks GOOD!!! Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble and breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this trellis. The holes were not big enough for the slats and the supporting frame cracked and broke in Certain spots. Now I have holes in the trellis. It took 3 of us to assemble it and it still broke. The instructions said to slide the slats, but nothing can slide. Overall poor instructions, poor construction and poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Bordeaux

customer_reviews.title: My Bougainvillea is going to look great on this trellis.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, would of gave it five stars except it was a little bit hard to assemble, the legs should’ve been longer so they could go deeper into the ground for a little more support . It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: GSB

customer_reviews.title: I have bought 3 now...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd one. This trellis is great and stands up to harsh weather.
customer_reviews.author: TnTBuckeye's

customer_reviews.title: Don't follow the directions
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trellis, and easy to assemble, as long as you don't follow the directions that come with it. You really need to install the center horizontal post first in order to get it into the end posts easier. It took two people because it is large, but the second one went much easier.
customer_reviews.author: KateTall

customer_reviews.title: NOT EASY TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: It's a good trellis, but no way in hell is that easy to assemble! The crossbars are flopping every which way when you try to line them up to put the other side on top. Finally resorted to inserting the vertical bars earlier to stabilize the crossbars before trying to put the other side on top.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel McVay

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s super nice, held up great for two years. I’m here to buy a second one for another section of my garden.
customer_reviews.author: fitstylegrace

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying more of them!
customer_reviews.text: I use as a freestanding trellis. Its big and tall and a great way to have a privacy screen at a reasonable cost. Great quality held up perfectly thru this last bad winter. Everyone comments on how nice they are. I ended up buying 3 and i may get another one!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Silverstein

customer_reviews.title: There’s one broken piece with my 4 set of purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 sets but one piece come broken. I am not sure will this affect in the long term. Overall It looks nice though. I set them up but still worry about the sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Kai Hung

customer_reviews.title: Bought three
customer_reviews.text: We bought one, liked it so much we bought two more. Looks great, goes together easy, and seems to be pretty durable. Can't wait until the vines grow all over it to block the neighbors!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This looks like an expensive trellis. We like the color and the size is substantial. It's like a big fence. We have climbers climbing it. It is impressive looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Great beautiful trellis. It’s heavy plastic but sturdy. I live in the desert and I’ll update this after the summer to see if it melts.
customer_reviews.author: PJD

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Color, size and overall look. Would like for it to have come with support rods for more sturdiness as plants grow. Beautiful though
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Easy to assemble. Excellent addition to to my garden.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and the right color for our patio.
customer_reviews.text: I needed help putting lattices together. I'm a senior female. Fits my needs to train bouganvillas up the lattices. Like the design but a little too tall.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Tedious assembly, but not overly difficult. The horizontal bars are soft, thus they sag between vertical cross beams. It looks ok and does the job but I would not purchase it again, or wouldn't have purchased it at all if I saw it in person first. It's a solid 2.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Lovely style but weak structurally
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of this trellis, but it isn't sturdy enough for a heavy vine. It tends to sag in the middle even when firmly attached to my fence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together just time consuming
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn't come with instructions would have been extremely helpful but it was easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly; looks great
customer_reviews.text: the first one took a bit longer to put together but the second one was assembled in just under an hour. It's definitely made easier with 2 people. Just too awkward for one to handle. Looks fantastic and I can't wait for the bougainvillea to be climbing up and over. So lightweight but looks like a metal fence. We've received numerous compliments already. .
customer_reviews.author: TXNaNa

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and not too hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and not too hard to assemble. I'm glad I read the other comment about making sure all the holes are on the same side while you are assembling it. That was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting for my husband to install, hopefully tomorrow. After lots of €€__&;&^%% to put together to make trellis free standing, and 50 screws later, trellis will make it through anything Michigan can send it's way. GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It was simple to put together. We loved the way it looked. We ended up ordering a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: ... landscaper installed in my back yard and I just love them. Im hoping by end of summer that ...
customer_reviews.text: My landscaper installed in my back yard and I just love them. Im hoping by end of summer that the plants I planted around them cover them. They look good covered or uncovered. I bought two to go in a corner
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Love this trellis
customer_reviews.text: This trellis looks very elegant! We love the color, and it compliments the flower bed while giving my clematis vine something substantial to climb on.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Stueland

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, easy assembly, great size, good color with house, good price for large coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking trellis!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, nice and sturdy once it is put together. My side post was damaged in shipping; called the company and they sent a replacement out immediately. Very pleased with every aspect of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: California Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great scale trellis.
customer_reviews.text: Great trellis even if no plant is on it. Offers great structure to a garden. Be patient putting it together. Plants need coaxing cause squares are big. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Wiscbeachbum

customer_reviews.title: Looks good in our garden
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively easy to install and the bougainvillea is already growing on it.
customer_reviews.author: witte

customer_reviews.title: It was an easy assembly. The only problem is the top caps
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive trellis. I put two on my garage wall and plan another for the side of the house. It was an easy assembly. The only problem is the top caps, which will need to be siliconed on.
customer_reviews.author: Gram49

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: We could not find a trellece that was tall enough for our needs until we ran across this one. Went up quick and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Once up they appear sturdy and my plants are already growing against them
customer_reviews.text: I had 4 of these trellises put together by a handyman, who reported no difficulties. Once up they appear sturdy and my plants are already growing against them.
customer_reviews.author: Will Staso

customer_reviews.title: Terrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions are terrible. There should be pictures identifying the pieces. This company should take lessons from IKEA regarding instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Karolyn Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The color was a light tan. We spray painted and are very pleased. Its been in our yard about 9 months and still looks good. It survived our Midwest winter quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Adds beauty and privacy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful on my back deck. All my friends, family and neighbors have gone crazy over it.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Sisler

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's like a fun puzzle to put together! Decent quality and looks nice installed. I installed against a wall and the mounting hardware was great.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Rice

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trellis! So easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Awesome trellis! So easy to put together. It is beautiful thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for decorative trellis that will not rot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and have been very pleased. They look nice, are good quality, and have had nothing but compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: P. christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and made.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and made. I shortened mine by 2 rungs for my application.
customer_reviews.author: RAH

customer_reviews.title: great finish to our patio
customer_reviews.text: I love this. We bought it to put on our patio against a wall that has a lot of wires and a utulity box. It looks great. We did paint it, the color was ugly. We painted it white to match our trim. Looks great and finishes the decor on our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Mar Hawk

customer_reviews.title: I love a product that is well made
customer_reviews.text: I love a product that is well made, that comes with instructions that make sense and is easy to assemble. I ordered two and I'm back to order a third. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: CarlaB.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: <3 it but didn't see it needed to be attached to a wall or something. OOPS
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: Not A Freestanding Trellis
customer_reviews.text: The size and quality and color are perfect. However, I didn't zoom in on the photo so I thought this was a free-standing trellis. It is not. It has to be bolted or screwed to something structural. I will use it, but not where I had planned to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Yeomer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Looks wonderfull. We put 2 on block wall side by side & they look great.
customer_reviews.author: T. McKay

customer_reviews.title: Looks very classy! Good quality. Hope it lasts well under all weather conditions.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Pretty simple to assemble. Be careful when placing the individual bars. To avoid re-adjusting, make sure that all the drill holes face the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Aparna Deshmkuh

customer_reviews.title: love the color like a mocha
customer_reviews.text: prefect for the yard, love the color like a mocha, sturdy and beautiful for my vine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winchester Trellis
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but my husband had to use off the shelf application to secure it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice product, easy to assemble and the Climatis loves it
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Ill fitting parts
customer_reviews.text: Good, attractive trellises but two parts had to be replaced two times for improper fit.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki R Hoagland

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! I ordered two more and an abor to match
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: Like others have said
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, the bottom post could be stronger. It says a little, but the plants don’t care.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Trellis - very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This went together easily and is a large impressive trellis. Very sturdy and will last for years! Don't hesitate on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: she has climbing roses and needed something like this. worked great
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my daughter, she has climbing roses and needed something like this. worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these trellis. They are exactly what I wanted. Using them along a block wall where I have planted bougainvillea's. Neighbors have stopped and commented on how beautiful they are. Very sturdy, once in place!!
customer_reviews.author: dfhensley

customer_reviews.title: Garden update.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful trellis!!! Looking forward to the jasmine growing onto it!
customer_reviews.author: Saskia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Happy ,very nice worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I like them ,still not put them to use yet ,worth the price Can be easily moved and change lication
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful in my garden
customer_reviews.text: A few more screws to hold this together would be beneficial. Looks beautiful in my garden.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Mac

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and can't wait for our hydrangea vines to take ...
customer_reviews.text: We got 3 for our side fence. It looks great and can't wait for our hydrangea vines to take hold. We plan on stringing yard lights on the trellis as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mario

customer_reviews.title: Very nice trellis.
customer_reviews.text: I had someone help me put this together and it's much easier with 2 people. Then had it installed with some metal posts to support it as I didn't want it attached to the fence. It's sturdy with the metal supports and looks very nice with a beautiful rose now starting to grow up on it instead of spreading out on the ground. I would recommend it, but don't try to do it by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: SGG

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, look and price. Was missing some screws and customer service sent them right out. After they arrived it was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: marcy k pakizer

customer_reviews.title: Trellis
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble although in our case the screws were missing. Good color. Good size openings for vines to wind through without breaking.
customer_reviews.author: KayJay

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts - poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The screws required to put the trellis together were not included in the parts. Therefore the product is useless for me to use.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Kopp

customer_reviews.title: great addition to your garden ....great to grow a privacy wall of beauty
customer_reviews.text: Took a long time to get house painted so this trellis could be installed..............I looks fantastic and we can't wait until the climbing flowers provide a solid wall of color. Solid, Sturdy, good design...recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Trellis
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product, but it is expensive for being plastic. That being said I like it for the size that it is and the area I'm using it in. Hopefully it will hold up to the hot Arizona sun.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and rich looking.
customer_reviews.text: This trellis looks rich and is sturdy - more like it was built in place with quality wood. I love it
customer_reviews.author: SomeBlonde

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great next to house for the Honeysuckle to grow on.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Walker

customer_reviews.title: I simply love the two trellises I bought
customer_reviews.text: I simply love the two trellises I bought! Purchased them for my clematis plants which had way overstretched their previous 5" trellises. The Winchester trellises were the only tall enough ones I could find. They are the exact color I needed. They were simple to assemble, but be aware of keeping all the screw holes on the same (front) side when laying it out.Otherwise you may have to lay it out again. I attached the trellises to the back wall of our cabin and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!!! Well Made! Easy to put together! Can't believe I got something so nice and sturdy on sale. The color was perfect in matching our stone foundation. Looks great.......can't say one thing negative! A perfect product! I appreciated the pointers on line about putting it together. Read them before I purchased. Had absolutely no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Lacoboni

customer_reviews.title: Little fiddly to put together but looks great attached to the fence and the hops are growing ...
customer_reviews.text: Little fiddly to put together but looks great attached to the fence and the hops are growing many and strong on this trellis.
customer_reviews.author: Don Elliston

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, excellent construction
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is required but I was amazed how easily these went together. Lots of holes to line up but they must have some excellent jigs or tooling at the factory so everything fit together easily and quickly. Sturdy but relatively light weight; I hung them from a cedar fence. We got the mocha color and it went well with the yard, not overwhelming. Put three side-by-side.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Looks like cedar against the cedar fence
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these (I got 5 this year and think I will add a few more next year). Because of fencing ordinances here, we cut them down to 6 ft. It was easy. All five assembled and mounted in less than 4 hours. Lots of compliments, and my sweet autumn clematis finally has a much needed home!
customer_reviews.author: Marydd

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl may require training
customer_reviews.text: While this trellis looks as nice as advertised, we have found that plants have a hard time staying attached to the trellis, and they are unable to naturally climb through the openings. This is most likely attributed to the vinyl surface, as the same plants easily adhere to our wood fences. With some training, the plants will stay attached to the trellis, but a wooden unit (while not as weatherproof) may be a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used a pair of these trellises to provide some privacy from a nearby road. When the vines I've planted mature, I'm sure they will do that and more, but in the meantime, they give the front walkway of my mid-century home a little gravitas. I found them easy to assemble--working alone it took me about 45 minutes per trellis--and they are attractive and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

product_meta.title: Dura-Trel 11174M Winchester Trellis, Mocha
product_meta.description: Made in USA. This large trellis with decorative finials is designed for use against most walls. It can be easily attached to any wood or vinyl siding using the included wall mounting screws and spacers. Measuring 96-Inch at its highest point and 57-Inch wide the Winchester Trellis is strong enough for any vine or climbing plant. Made with the highest quality PVC vinyl, this trellis is completely maintenance free. The high quality PVC vinyl contains the highest concentration of titanium dioxide for the strongest UV sunlight protection. Buy with confidence, all Dura-Trel products are backed with a 20 year warranty guaranteeing your trellis will never delaminate, crack, peel, fade or discolor in any way. Once assembled and installed in your yard, the only maintenance ever needed is a simple spray with a garden hose and wipe clean.
feature_bullets: 20 Year Warranty; 100-percent maintenance free; PVC vinyl will not crack, fade, peel or discolor
Easy to Assemble; pre-cut and pre-drilled holes with all hardware included
Easy to Install; install against wood, siding or log wall included with wall mounting kit
